subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Richard Zednik, who sustained a serious cut on his neck from a skate blade, benefited from “luck,” said one of the doctors who performed emergency surgery to repair Zednik’s common carotid artery.
snippet: Richard Zednik, who sustained a serious cut on his neck from a skate blade, benefited from “luck,” said one of the doctors who performed emergency surgery to repair Zednik’s common carotid artery.
